data.name: Red Spider: Vengeance
data.detailed_description:
Red Spider2: Exiled is available on Steam.

Red Spider2: Exiled ,the prequel to Red Spider: Vengeance is on steam.
http://store.steampowered.com/app/560790


About the Game

We're an indie game developer studio from Japan.
We're big fans of Hong Kong films and want to present the fascination of them.
Red Spider: Vengeance is a Hong Kong noir style visual novel inspired by many hong kong movies, especially Infernal Affairs series and Johnnie To's films.
There are 6 story routes with the different characters(approximately 105,000 words in total).

Synopysis

Yvet grew up as an orphan on the Mainland. She was taken in by a crime syndicate when she was young and trained as an assassin.
She killed many people, but she had her reasons for breaking out of that group. She escaped and married Francis, the leader of the Red Flower Society, an underworld mob that operated in Kowloon, Hong Kong.
One day, Francis was shot in a nightclub, and a doctor said that it was highly unlikely he would regain consciousness.
Yvet takes over his responsibilities and tries to find the person who was behind the shooting, with her bodyguards and a private detective she knew.

data.short_description: "Red Spider" is a Hong Kong Noir-themed Visual Novel. There are 6 story routes with the different characters(approximately 105,000 words in total).
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Nice artwork. Good taste.”
Vector Software Review(written in Japanese)

“It was the best !!!”
★★★★★ – Google Play Review(written in Japanese)

“Great! I can only say that.”
★★★★★ – Google Play Review(written in Japanese)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 display (1280x1024 recommended) with 16-bit video card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Adobe AIR application

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 display (1280x1024 recommended) with 16-bit video card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Adobe AIR application
